ARABIC: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَٰدِى ٱلْعُمْىِ عَن ضَلَٰلَتِهِمْ إِن تُسْمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُم مُّسْلِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You will not guide blind men out of their error. You will not make anyone hear except for those who have iman in Our Signs and so are Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Nor can you lead the blind when they have gone astray. You can make none hear except those who believe in Our signs and have come to peace and submission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: nor can you direct the blind to the Right Way, preventing them from falling into error. You can make only those who believe in Our verses to hear the call and then submit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You cannot guide the straying blind ones. You can only make hear those who believe in Our revelations submissively.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And you will not guide the blind out of their error; and none listen to you except those who accept faith in Our signs, and they are Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nor can you lead the blind out of their error. You can only make to hear those who believe in Our Ayat, so they submit (became Muslims).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nor can you be a guide to the blind out of their error; you cannot make to bear (any one) except those who believe in Our communications, so they submit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thou shalt not guide the blind out of their error neither shalt thou make any to hear, save such as believe in Our signs, and so surrender.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nor canst thou lead the blind out of their error. Thou canst make none to hear, save those who believe Our revelations and who have surrendered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: nor can you guide the blind out of their error. You can make only those hear you who believe in Our revelations and surrender themselves to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Nor canst thou lead the blind out of their error. Thou canst make none hear save these who believe in Our signs and who have submitted themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: nor can you lead the blind out of their error. You can make only those hear you who believe in Our signs and have submitted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor canst thou be a guide to the blind, (to prevent them) from straying: only those wilt thou get to listen who believe in Our Signs, and they will bow in Islam.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nor can you lead the blind out of their error, you can only make to hear those who believe in Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.), and who have submitted (themselves to Allah in Islam as Muslims).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Nor do you guide the blind out of their error, nor do you make any to hear, except those who believe in Our verses and are Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Nor can you guide the blind out of their straying. You can make no one listen, except those who believe in Our verses; for they are Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And you cannot guide the blind away from their error. You will only make hear those who believe in Our verses so they are Muslims [submitting to Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:81] nor can you lead the blind out of their error. You can only make those hear — hear so as to comprehend and accept — who believe in Our signs — the Qur’ān — and have therefore submitted, [are therefore] sincere in their affirmation of God’s Oneness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nor canst thou) Muhammad (lead the blind out of their error) to guidance. (Thou canst make none to hear) your call, (save those who believe Our revelations) Our Scripture and Messenger (and who have surrendered) and are sincere in their worship and profession of Allah's divine Oneness.
